name: archipelago-json
description: Archipelago JSON Export Tools - A frontend-focused fork that exports Archipelago game logic to JSON and provides a web-based client with advanced tracking.

scripts.test: TEST_MODE=${npm_config_mode:-test} TEST_GAME=${npm_config_game:-} TEST_SEED=${npm_config_seed:-} RULES_OVERRIDE=${npm_config_rules:-} playwright test
scripts.test:headed: TEST_MODE=${npm_config_mode:-test} TEST_GAME=${npm_config_game:-} TEST_SEED=${npm_config_seed:-} RULES_OVERRIDE=${npm_config_rules:-} playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: TEST_MODE=${npm_config_mode:-test} TEST_GAME=${npm_config_game:-} TEST_SEED=${npm_config_seed:-} RULES_OVERRIDE=${npm_config_rules:-} playwright test --debug
scripts.test:ui: TEST_MODE=${npm_config_mode:-test} TEST_GAME=${npm_config_game:-} TEST_SEED=${npm_config_seed:-} RULES_OVERRIDE=${npm_config_rules:-} playwright test --ui
scripts.test:full-suite: npm run test:health && npm test && npm run test:analyze
